objectSets.name: First Pass - Insert/Upsert with Draft Status

objects.query: SELECT Description, IsDefault, Name, Status FROM PaymentTerm
SELECT Description, PaymentTermId, PaymentTimeframe, Period, PeriodUnit, Type FROM PaymentTermItem

SELECT BillingTreatmentId, BillingType, Controller, CurrencyIsoCode, Description, FlatAmount, Handling0Amount, Name, Percentage, ProcessingOrder, Sequencing, Status, Type FROM BillingTreatmentItem
